Quality-of-Result Tracking

The main QoR tracking regression tests:

  • Nightly Regression
    • VTR:
      • Critical Path Delay, Minimum Channel Width, Routed Wirelength
      • Pack Time, Place Time, Crit. Path Route Time, VPR Peak Memory
    • MCNC:
      • Critical Path Delay, Minimum Channel Width, Routed Wirelength
      • Pack Time, Place Time, Crit. Path Route Time, VPR Peak Memory
  • Weekly Regression
    • VTR:
      • Critical Path Delay, Minimum Channel Width, Routed Wirelength
      • Pack Time, Place Time, Crit. Path Route Time, VPR Peak Memory
    • Titan:
      • Critical Path Delay, Routed Wirelength
      • Pack Time, Place Time, Crit. Path Route Time, VPR Peak Memory

The following regression tests are run after every check-in:

  • Basic Regression
  • Strong Regression
